artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: N/E; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: See individual pieces. Muliti shades gray and brown, black & white warp. Brown, tan, metallic green, silver & orange weft. Development for yarn dyed fabrics. Plain weave. Right selvedge.Thick yarns. "H-2" & black & dots glued to outside of card. (multi brown & metallics))
